generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface extending forward is clearly a road, as it is the main driving surface in the image.
- sidewalk: The paved areas on both sides of the road, separated by curbs, are sidewalks designated for pedestrians.
- building: Multiple buildings with distinct architectural features line both sides of the street.
- pole: A vertical pole with a traffic sign attached is visible on the right side of the street.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (P) is mounted on the pole on the right side of the street.
- vegetation: A tree with green foliage is visible in the background between the buildings.
- person: A person is visible standing near the parked car in the distance.
- car: A silver car is parked on the right side of the street, partially visible in the distance.
